JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Dean Spielmann;Elisabeth Steiner;Giorgio Malinverni;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE - On - Don . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by PERSON , Representative of GPE at ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

In DATE the applicant took part in the emergency operations at the site of the GPE nuclear plant accident . In DATE a medical board found that , as a result of exposure to radioactive emissions , he had a “ category CARDINAL ” disability .
The applicant brought proceedings against ORG of GPE ( Военный Комиссариат PERSON области – “ the Commission ” ) seeking to obtain compensation for damage to his health .

On DATE ORG of Rostov - on - Don granted the applicant ’s claim and obliged the Commission to pay him MONEY ( RUB ) in respect of arrears for the period from DATE to CARDINAL DATE , and RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL in respect of DATE compensation for health damage as from DATE , subject to further indexation .
The Commission did not lodge an ordinary appeal against the above judgment , and it became binding and enforceable DATE .
In DATE the applicant brought proceedings before the court seeking to have his DATE compensation recalculated to take account of inflation .

On DATE ORG of Rostov - on - Don granted the applicant ’s claim and obliged the Commission to pay him RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL in respect of arrears for the period from DATE to CARDINAL DATE , and RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL in respect of DATE compensation for health damage as from DATE , subject to further indexation .
The judgment was not appealed against and became binding and enforceable on DATE .
On DATE the Commission requested the court to reconsider the judgment of DATE . The request read as follows :
“ [ The applicant ] receives [ social benefits ] in accordance with the PERSON on social protection of the victims of the GPE nuclear plant accident .
The PERSON on social protection of the victims of the GPE nuclear plant accident obliges the welfare authorities to index - link the sums in question in accordance with the law .

In view of the newly discovered circumstances related to indexation of [ social benefits ] in line with the increase of the minimum cost of living , previously unknown to the ORG , ... , [ the ORG ] requests the court to quash the judgment of ORG of DATE and reconsider the case due to the discovery of new circumstances . ”

On DATE ORG of PERSON - on - PERSON decided to grant the ORG ’s request . The court held that when the judgment of CARDINAL DATE was pronounced , there was no court practice concerning indexation of sums of compensation for health damage , which had led to an incorrect interpretation of the decision of ORG of DATE . However , in the meantime , on DATE the Rostov ORG took a decision in another individual case , subsequently upheld on appeal by ORG of GPE , whereby it determined the mechanism of indexation of social benefits to GPE victims in compliance with the existing legislation . Therefore , in accordance with Articles CARDINAL and CARDINAL of the Code of Civil Procedure , the court quashed the judgment of CARDINAL DATE and remitted the case for reconsideration . No appeal lay against this decision .
On DATE , after the fresh examination of the case , ORG of PERSON - on - Don partly granted the applicant ’s claim and determined that his DATE compensation should amount to RUB ORG as from DATE .
On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of DATE on appeal .
On DATE the applicant lodged an application for supervisory review of the judgment of DATE , as upheld on appeal on DATE .

On DATE the Presidium of the Rostov ORG granted the applicant ’s request , quashed the judgment of DATE , as upheld on appeal on DATE , by way of supervisory review and remitted the case for a fresh examination . Until the quashing of the judgment of CARDINAL DATE the applicant continued to receive his DATE compensation in the amount established by the judgment of DATE .

As a result of the fresh examination of the case , on DATE ORG of Rostov - on - Don partly granted the applicant ’s claim and determined that the applicant ’s DATE compensation should amount to RUB CARDINAL as from DATE .
On DATE the Rostov ORG quashed the above judgment on appeal and remitted the case for a fresh examination .

On DATE ORG of Rostov - on - Don determined that the applicant ’s DATE compensation should amount to RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL as from DATE . The court also obliged the defendant to pay the applicant RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL in arrears for the period from DATE to DATE .
On DATE ORG upheld the above judgment on appeal .
The Code of Civil Procedure of GPE ( “ the CCivP ” ) , in force as from DATE , provides as follows :
“ CARDINAL . [ Judgments ] which have come into force may be re - considered on the basis of newly discovered circumstances .
CARDINAL . The grounds for reconsideration ... shall be :
CARDINAL ) NORP significant circumstances which were not and could not have been known to the party who applies for reconsideration ; ... ”
“ ... [ An application for reconsideration of a [ judgment ] due to the discovery of new circumstances ] shall be lodged within DATE after the discovery of the circumstances . ”

“ The time - limit for lodging an application for reconsideration of a [ judgment ] due to the discovery of new circumstances shall be calculated from DATE of the discovery of such circumstances ... ”

“ CARDINAL . Following the examination of an application for reconsideration of a [ judgment ] due to the discovery of new circumstances , the court may either grant the application and quash the [ judgment ] , or dismiss the application .
CARDINAL . NORP The court decision by which an application for reconsideration of a [ judgment ] due to the discovery of new circumstances is granted shall not be subject to appeal .
CARDINAL . Provided that a [ judgment ] is quashed , the case shall be examined in accordance with the rules of this LAW . ”
